verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:29
verses.text: Let it rest on the head of Joab, and on all his father’s house; and let there not fail from the house of Joab one that hath an issue, or that is a leper, or that leaneth on a staff, or that falleth on the sword, or that lacketh bread.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:30
verses.text: So Joab and Abishai his brother slew Abner, because he had slain their brother Asahel at Gibeon in the battle.
